capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to split a string into an array by regex or another string

entryPoint.name: Split String into Array by Regex or Separator - IAP

inputs.name: inputString
inputs.description: String to be splitted into array

inputs.name: separatorString
inputs.description: String used as a separator. If "separatorString" and "separatorRegex" are included, "separatorString" is used by default and the "separatorRegex" is ignored

inputs.name: separatorRegex
inputs.description: Regex pattern used as a separator. If "separatorString" and "separatorRegex" are included, "separatorString" is used by default and the "separatorRegex" is ignored

inputs.name: limit
inputs.description: A non-negative integer specifying a limit on the number of substrings to be included in the array

name: Split String into Array by Regex or Separator - IAP
overview: Split a string into an array by regex or another string
webName: Split String into Array by Regex or Separator - IAP
